column2: "...Hello. Have you heard the news about that newly-released Class?"

"...Braver, that's what it was. The rumors say that someone in ARKS proposed it.
...They must have put in a lot of effort."
"...But I don't think it's done enough as a Class yet, we need to give it our support."
"...So, if you want to try Braver, it might be a good idea to party with a Force."
"...If you get injured, they can be there to heal you."
"...On the other hand, I think you should avoid teaming up with a Hunter."
"...It depends on who you party with, but they're not very flexible, and it could be dangerous for both of you."
"...It was hard work in the ARKS Battle Tournament."
"...In any case, party with a Force to start with. That would be safest."
